title: wp Riot, you f*cked my PvP.net again
body:
I swear every 2nd patch just fucks up the client. Stop the sloppy shit Riot.

UPDATE 1: Upon closer inspection, it seems that the servers (or at least something server-side) have actually just shat themselves. It is not client-based (for once).

UPDATE 2: Servers are back up. Ranked & Ranked Teams are Disabled. Flush DNS and reboot computer if you have any issues reconnecting. Refresh External IP if issues persist.

replies.body: Nvm, i used a vpn now it works fine
exactly what happened to me havent been able to log in to my euw account for 2 days now fkn bs fuckn rito
And when i posted this on euw boards people said it's just me go fk urselves havent played lol for 2 days losing my fkn shit guys halp
Yeah it is their servers, cause it happened to me too.
